ruleset.name: Apex Structure Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex code structure and organization

rule.name: ClassesMustHaveMethods
rule.message: Classes, including inner classes, must have instance methods. Purely parameter classes with only attributes and constructors are not allowed
rule.description: Classes and inner classes that only contain attributes and constructors without any instance methods are not allowed. Add instance methods to provide behavior, or refactor to use a different approach.
